properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Waumini
njooni tumwimbie
Bwana,
tumshukuru muumba wetu.
Kwani ametujalia,
tumeweza
kuiona siku hii njema. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Siku hii iliyopita,
ametulinda salama.
Tunamushukuru Mungu Baba,
yeye ni mweza yote.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Afya ametujalia,
twatembea kwa maringo.
Tunamshukuru Mungu Baba,
yeye ni mwenza yote.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Katuepusha ajali,
katukinga na magonjwa.
Tunamshukuru Mungu Baba,
yeye ni mweza yote.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jua mwezi pia nyota,
vyote atuangazia.
Tunamshukuru Mungu Baba,
yeye ni mweza yote.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ndege pia na wanyama,
nao wanafurahia.
Tunamshukuru Mungu Baba,
yeye ni mweza yote.
